# LD31 - Lolfest

## Home Page:
http://ld31.askenback.se/

## Code:
https://github.com/Ashenback/LD31

## TECH:
* WebGL http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/WebGL
* PIXI.js http://pixijs.com/
* Web Audio API http://webaudio.github.io/web-audio-api/ (https://dvcs.w3.org/hg/audio/raw-file/tip/webaudio/specification.html)
* WebSocket http://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/WebSocket
socket.io http://socket.io/
* deviceOrientation http://w3c.github.io/deviceorientation/spec-source-orientation.html
